text: in the Mahabharata Arjuna was in a
mission to enrich as our Kiran skills
with the sabotage shrah from Lord
Parameshwara
he means the now aged Hanuman who's
sitting in a deep forest by the side of
the pond and performing Rama jebin
pranams from the divine grace that is
emanating from your good self may I
assume that you are Hanuman the holy
Chiranjeevi Shri Rama Geum
you are right Arjuna I feel happy to see
another skillful Archer I understand
what you mean honey mooshri tell me
frankly was Rama such a great Archer
what makes you doubt this young man if
Rama was truly a great Archer he would
have woven the say to bridge across the
sea with his own arrows and not allowed
monkeys to play stones to float on the
water everything was possible for Rama
but he wanted to go through the travails
of a human being and not do something
that would keep reminding him that he
was God nice reasoning I am NOT God but
I can weave a bridge across the water
with my arrows I'll do it right now if
you'd walk on it hmm this kid needs to
be taught a lesson
why not Arjuna let me have the pleasure
- go ahead all right
Hani Masri I'm sure you now believe what
I mentioned kindly place your right foot
forward and walk on my bridge of pride
hmm hurry Rama what is this I'm a VIII
cold monkey this bridge could not even
bear the feather touch of my foot
no wonder my Lord Rama did not do such
misadventures Arjuna realizes his folly
light his final pyre and prepares to end
his life a pious Brahmin intervenes and
stops him he offers to be a referee
between Hanuman and Arjuna and requests
Arjuna to build the aerobridge again
the aerobridge is a movin again Hanlon
stands right in the middle of the bridge
it takes all his weight without any
hassle
Hahnemann bends and has a look down and
is awestruck to find a huge tall toys
taking the load of the bridge on its
back both Hanuman and Arjuna do not know
what is happening krishna appears
Oh Gina I came in the guise of a referee
to save you and your skills for the
benefit of all beings in the universe
Thank You Lord Krishna you not only
saved my skills but also prevented them
from getting to my head
jerem Jiki panama sri kindly pardon me
for my misdemeanor and bless me
Arjuna I'm a great admirer of your
province I shall take a permanent place
in the flag atop your rudder and be the
first to witness your success this is my
ultimate fortune pronoun
